effects.description: Passive ability: "Deathblow"

attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

skillTree.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.

effects.description: Replaces: "Deathblow"
Passive ability: "Determined Deathblow"

skillTree.localised_description: It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, the opponent has no chance.

effects.description: Replaces: "Determined Deathblow"
Passive ability: "Extremely Daring Deathblow"

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8%
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Distinguished by his scars he may be, but since the point of being a Slayer is to die, one wonders when this one is going to start applying himself to the task at hand.

effects.description: Ward save: 5%
Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_name: Army of One, Slayer of Many
skillTree.localised_description: Some people don't need friends; in fact, friends might get in the way and be accidentally killed in a particularly nasty way.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Worthy Foe"
Attribute: Causes Fear

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Many a tale, many a promise, and many a grave threat is scored into these fleshy drapes, detailing a life spent in the dogged pursuit of death…  and chiefly, their own!

skillTree.localised_description: When led by a Dwarf of sufficient calibre, a band of Slayers is many times more lethal – speeding to the heart of the action to cut it from the foe's still-screaming body!

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.localised_description: Many blows over many battles have hardened this warrior beyond compare, making his hide as tough as Dragon scales.

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is a Slayer. Slayers can never have their Weapon Strength reduced during a battle.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (200)
